itemDescription: English classical philologist, textual critic, headmaster, and university professor, active in England and Australia

wikipedia_page.main: This entry refers to a professor from Australia, for the physician from London see Charles Badham (physician).Reverend Charles Badham (19 July 1813 – 27 February 1884) was an English classical philologist, textual critic, headmaster, and university professor, active in England and even more so in Australia.
